text: Akka ay ten id Nessenker, iwakken ad mesteqsin. Inna yiwen segsen: "aceal n lweqt ay tesaaddam"? Nnan d: "nesaadda ass ne$ ur ibbwiv wass". Nnan: "Mass nnwen Yif akw akken Izoa ay tesaaddam. Aznet ar temdint, yiwen segwen, s idrimen agi nnwen. Ad iwali anwa lqut iufan mavi, ad awen d iawi ooeeq, segs. Ad ieader iman is, iwakken ur awen ipfaq yiwen
